Type.BattleDialog: I-if this goes well, maybe we can move over to a better body, right?
M-money, money, money! I-it must be nice having lots of riches.
M-monsters, I-I’ll chop you all to pieces!
W-we’re finally getting fancier and tougher new bodies.
T-the long hardships have paid off, f-friends. N-now let’s go back and get some good rest.
W-what was the point of working so hard, r-replacing our bodies with machinery…
M-maybe I should have spent more time enjoying my life…
T-they’re weak, just as I expected.
I-it’s a shame I can’t kick you guys off.
I-I didn’t want to break down myself
S-stupid mechanical bodies… I-it should be stronger than this.
T-thank you for staying with me until the end…
T-this is a curious place, and quite big, too…
D-don’t you think our metallic bodies are stronger than your soft flesh?
M-my body creaks a lot, but it’s still durable.
I-it’s finally time to say goodbye to these creaking noises.
I-if we have enough money left to spare… H-how about we go on a short vacation?
I-it’s quite saddening to die in scrap metal and not my human body…
I-it’s cold, t-this feels lonely.
I-I don’t miss my target.
I-I suppose everything comes with a price.
M-my body may be shoddy scrap metal, but it’s more useful than that squishy body of yours.
…I-it’s been an honor to work with you. I hope you can rest now.
T-they were my long-time friends, b-but this is not the time to be sad over their losses.
I-I’m fueled up and ready to go!
M-maybe I’d like restaurant coupons more than books…
M-my body is harder than yours, don’t you see?
W-we’ve really won?! D-dude, for real…!
L-let’s go to a restaurant to celebrate our victory!
I-I should’ve eaten a lot of tasty stuff… I-if I knew I was gonna die here…
I-I worked like a dog only to die like this. T-this is so unfair.
H-haha! Y-you’re just as weak as I thought.
L-looks like cheap-looking workshop equipment had enough power, h-huh?
W-we’ve got this in the bag~
…I-I can’t believe it. H-he just blew up like “boom” and……
…D-don’t be so heartless, g-give me a moment.
